summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FLEX. UPON STARTING THE VEHICLE, THE POWER STEERING AND ASSIST TRAX WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER (BOB WONDRIES FORD 400 S ATLANTIC BLVD, ALHAMBRA, CA 91801 (626) 289-3591) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE STEERING WHEEL MODULE MALFUNCTIONED AND NEEDED REPLACEMENT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE CONTACT RESEARCHED RECALLS ONLINE AND FOUND NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V340000 (STEERING). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 66,000.
